description: Triangle T(n,k) of number of digraphs with a source and a sink on n labeled nodes and k arcs, k=0,1,..,n*(n-1).
references: V. Jovovic, G. Kilibarda, Enumeration of labeled initially-finally connected digraphs, Scientific review, Serbian Scientific Society, 19-20 (1996), p. 245.
links: V. Jovovic and G. Kilibarda, Enumeration of labeled quasi-initially connected digraphs, Discrete Math., 224 (2000), 151-163.
example: Triangle starts:[1],[0,2,1],[0,0,6,20,15,6,1],[0,0,0,24,234,672,908,792,495,220,66,12,1],...Number of digraphs with a source and a sink on 3 labeled nodes is 48=6+20+15+6+1.
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Sep 14 2000
